mapper.insert: insert into product_subtable (id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specificationItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnableSpec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleService,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product_subtable set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu = #{spu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specification_items = #{specificationItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_item_id = #{defaultItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enable_spec = #{isEnableSpec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_template_id = #{typeTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_list = #{packageList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_service = #{saleService,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable
mapper.update: update product_subtable set brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specification_items = #{specificationItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_item_id = #{defaultItemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enable_spec = #{isEnableSpec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_template_id = #{typeTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_list = #{packageList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_service = #{saleService,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable where product_id = #{productId}

select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable where seller_id LIKE #{sellerId}

select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable where spu=#{spuId} and default_item_id LIKE #{productSpec}

select id, product_id, seller_id, brand_id, spu, specification_items, default_item_id, is_enable_spec, type_template_id, package_list, sale_service from product_subtable where sale_service=#{convertibleDesc}
